title: Creates the Mature Workers Support Program
summary: Creates the Mature Workers Support Program.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                        472--A

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. DINOWITZ, JAFFEE, ROBINSON, GUNTHER, MILLMAN,
         LUPARDO, N. RIVERA,  CASTRO,  SCARBOROUGH,  MAISEL,  GIBSON,  BOYLAND,
         HEVESI,  J. RIVERA  --  Multi-Sponsored  by  -- M. of A. ABBATE, COOK,
         CRESPO, DESTITO, GOTTFRIED, MARKEY, McENENY, McKEVITT -- read once and
         referred to the Committee  on  Aging  --  committee  discharged,  bill
         amended,  ordered reprinted as amended and recommitted to said commit-
         tee

       AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to creating the mature  work-
         ers support program

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The elder law is amended by adding a new article 3 to  read
    2  as follows:
    3                                 ARTICLE III
    4                       MATURE WORKERS SUPPORT PROGRAM
    5  SECTION 301. MATURE WORKERS SUPPORT PROGRAM.
    6    S  301.  MATURE  WORKERS  SUPPORT  PROGRAM.  1.  THE  OFFICE SHALL, IN
    7  CONJUNCTION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, DEVELOP AND UPDATE ON AN ANNU-
    8  AL BASIS A GUIDE FOR BUSINESSES FOR HIRING,  RETAINING,  AND  RETRAINING
    9  MATURE WORKERS IN NEW YORK STATE.
   10    2.   SUCH GUIDE SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE ON THE WEBSITES OF THE OFFICE,
   11  DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, AND DEPARTMENT OF  STATE.  BUSINESSES  THAT  OBTAIN
   12  CERTIFICATION OR LICENSURE FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR OR DEPARTMENT OF
   13  STATE  SHALL BE PROVIDED WITH A LINK TO THIS GUIDE, OR A PAPER COPY UPON
   14  REQUEST, WHEN THEY APPLY FOR SUCH CERTIFICATION OR LICENSURE. A  REASON-
   15  ABLE FEE MAY BE CHARGED FOR PAPER COPIES PROVIDED TO INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE
   16  NOT BUSINESS OWNERS.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04536-02-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to creating the mature workers support program
